import {IoMdSunny, IoMdRainy, IoMdCloudy, IoMdSnow,IoMdThunderstorm, IoMdSearch} from 'react-icons/io'; import {BsArrowUp, BsArrowDown, BsThermometer, BsWind, BsWater} from 'react-icons/bs'; function CurrentWeather(weather){ return ( <>

{weather.name}

Tuesday | 9 May 2023 | Local time: 12:00am

25 °C

High: {weather.temp_max}°C

Low: {weather.temp_min}°C

Feels like {weather.feels_like}°C

Wind {weather.speed}m/s

Humidity: {weather.humidity}%

) } export default CurrentWeather;
